indexAddCommand :: FilePath -> IO () Source #

Add specified file/dir to staging area

indexRemoveCommand :: FilePath -> IO () Source #

Removes specified file/dir from staging area.

loadIndex :: IO (Map FilePath ShaHash) Source #

Loads content of staging area.

mergeIndexWith :: Map FilePath ShaHash -> [(FilePath, ShaHash)] -> Map FilePath ShaHash Source #

Merges specified files into staging area.

removeFromIndex :: Map FilePath ShaHash -> [FilePath] -> Map FilePath ShaHash Source #

Removes specified files from staging area.
